issue.title: Add checkstyle policy to java project
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-208](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-208). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As suggested by `[~jnadeau]` in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/65, a set of checkstyle policies should be added to Arrow java project so we can get best practices and style checks enforced at build time.
